item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Your Name *
[text* your-name default:user_display_name]

Your Email *
[email* your-email default:user_email]

Subject *
[text* your-subject]

Attach file
[file file-827 limit:2048 filetypes:png|jpg|txt|zip]

Your Message *
[textarea your-message]

[submit class:btn class:btn-primary "Send"]
